name: Minecraft Backup Program
body:
**MBP** is program writed by **HafisCZ**. This program serves as a backup manager, primarily for **Minecraft**. It includes the ability to backup any folder to a _.zip_ file, restore the folder from a backup and easy backup management. Screenshots are at the end of the page.

If you have any tips & ideas, or you just want to report error, send me an [e-mail](mailto:mar00m@seznam.cz).

**Important:** Actually, you need to run program with following argument, if You want to use cloud service.
`-Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true`

### Licence
- This program is licenced under Creative Commons BY-NC-ND.

### Features
- Manual backup creation & use
- Backup management, Rename & Remove
- Basic FTP interface (Upload, Download and Remove)
- Automatic backup creation with split modified by user (Max. 23 hours & 59 minutes)
- Custom backup file description

### WIP Features
- Internal command line / output
- FTP interface

### Planned features
- Integrated access to user's cloud (Google Drive, DropBox or via FTP transfer)

### Application settings
- This app is using 2 files (data.ini and cloud.ini) for storing all settings
- data.ini's file description:
    >[dateformat]  
    >0 // Choosen date and time format, ranging from 0 to 5  
    >[path]  
    >C:\savefolder // Path to your map folder which will be stored in backup file  
    >C:\backup // Path to folder where You want to store your backup files  
    >C:\mc.exe // Path to your Minecraft file  
    >[timebackup]  
    >0 // Boolean value, enable or disable timed saving  
    >36611 // Period, after which will be map automatically backed if timed backup is started  

- cloud.ini's file description:
    >[cloud]  
    >0 // Boolean value, enable or disable FTPService  
    >127.0.0.1 // IP used by FTPService, IP of desired FTP server  
    >21 // Port which will be used for connecting to FTP server  
    >USER // Username used for connecting to FTP server  
    >USER // Password used for connecting to FTP server  

### Requirements
- Java 7 or newer
- Any current Operating System (Does not support Windows XP and older systems)

### Links
* [Direct Download](https://github.com/HafisCZ/MinecraftAutoBackupProgram/blob/master/Minecraft%20Backup%20Utility.jar?raw=true)
* [Minecraft](http://www.minecraft.net)

### Used Libraries
* [Zip4j](http://www.lingala.net/zip4j/)
* [FTP4j](http://www.sauronsoftware.it/projects/ftp4j/)
